title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           Ninety Six National Historic Site 1103 Hwy 248  Ninety Six, SC 29666                 Directions         2 miles south of Ninety Six, SC on Hwy 248. For more detailed information, please go to http://www.nps.gov/nisi/planyourvisit/directions.htm  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Star Fort Pond Star Fort Pond is CLOSED 9 AM Sunday – 9 AM Wednesday. April 1 - October 31, the pond is open Wednesday - Saturday for fishing. November 1 - March 31, Star Fort Pond is open 9:00 - 4:00. No fishing.    Standard Hours    Sunday: Closed   Monday: Closed   Tuesday: Closed   Wednesday: Closed   Thursday: Closed   Friday: Closed   Saturday: Closed      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:   -       New Year’s Day:   -       Thanksgiving Day:   -           Visitor Center Parking Lot and Grounds Visitor Center is CLOSED Mondays & Tuesdays, but the parking lot and park grounds open dawn to dusk. Gates lock at 5 PM.   Standard Hours    Sunday: Open 24 hours   Monday: Closed   Tuesday: Closed   Wednesday: Open 24 hours   Thursday: Open 24 hours   Friday: Open 24 hours   Saturday: Open 24 hours      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:   -       Columbus Day:   -       Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr.:   -       New Year’s Day:   -       Thanksgiving Day:   -       Washington’s Birthday:   -                  Weather           Temperatures for the area range from very hot and humid in the summer to cool and moderate in the winter. http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?CityName=Ninety+Six&state=SC&site=GSP&lat=34.172&lon=-82.0235#.Vhl2muxVhBc         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Entrance Fee - $0.00 Free!         Visitor Centers       Ninety Six National Historic Site Museum contains a reproduction 3-pounder cannon, artifacts found on the battlefield, and other exhibits. "Ninety Six: Crossroads" is a 22-minute video shown on request. Sales Outlet operated by Eastern National offers books, postcards, and theme-related souvenirs.                  Interpretive Trail around Ninety Six NPS  When is the park open? How do I get there? Does it cost anything to visit? What's the weather like? You will find the answers to these and many other questions here.
